Class PasswordUtils

java.lang.Object
PasswordUtils
public class PasswordUtils
extends java.lang.Object
PasswordUtils - util class that manages password related issue. For example:

hashing the password, verify user enter password, generate random password for new created account

      public static java.lang.String getSalt​(int length)
      Usage: create the salt
      Parameters:
      length - indicate the length of the salt that wants to be generated
      Returns:
      salt string

    • hash

      public static byte[] hash​(char[] password, byte[] salt)
      Usage: function that use to hash the password
      Parameters:
      password - password
      salt - salt
      Returns:
      the hashed password

    • generateSecurePassword

      public static java.lang.String generateSecurePassword​(java.lang.String password, java.lang.String salt)
      Usage: create a more secure password that being hashed with salt
      Parameters:
      password - the password that user has entered
      salt - an unique string that use for generating secure password
      Returns:
      the password that has being hashed

    • verifyUserPassword

      public static boolean verifyUserPassword​(java.lang.String providedPassword, java.lang.String securedPassword, java.lang.String salt)
      Usage: use to verify user entered password with the password in the database
      Parameters:
      providedPassword - the password that user entered during login
      securedPassword - the hashed password that stored in UserTable.
      salt - some string that needs to be used when generating the password, as well as during password validation
      Returns:
      the status of user password is valid or invalid

    • generatePassword

      public static char[] generatePassword​(int length)
      Usage: generate a random password using 4 combination of inputs: UpperCase,LowerCase,special characters and numbers.
      Parameters:
      length - indicate the size of the auto generated password
      Returns:
      auto-generated password
